A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was great ! I'm not just saying it as a fan of the weird since I was seven with the empires strike back but also due to I like the new characters driving the lore and story in new directions . The writer brought new twists and new storylines into the story while having a concrete plot . I also like the new planets and scenarios the characters are put in . The new heroes are backed by old time favorites and at the same time the new characters hold your interest for two and a half hours . In fact I didn't even notice how much time had past and didn't ben use the bathroom once .
